channel.title: User Interface Design on Herbert Mühlburger
channel.description: Recent content in User Interface Design on Herbert Mühlburger

item.title: [video] – User Interface Fundamentals for Programmers
item.description: Recently I have found a great video demonstrating the user interface design fundamentals every programmer should know. Check out the video, it is really interesting! UI Fundamentals for Programmers by Ryan Singer from ChicagoRuby on Vimeo. (via Smashing Magazine) Related articles by Zemanta

item.title: Web Design Interfaces
item.description: I have found two great posts on web design interfaces. The first one deales with 30 essential controls used in web interfaces. The second one descirbes 15 common components used in web user interface design. On designwebinterfaces.com you can find many more useful posts dealing with web design interfaces. Related articles by Zemanta
